ðŸ“– Summary: OpenTune is an open-source YouTube Music client for Android designed with Material Design 3. It provides an ad-free listening experience, background playback, and advanced search capabilities. Users can log in to their accounts, manage their library, download content for offline use, and enjoy features like synchronized lyrics and smart silence skipping.
